p: Tender shoots of M. balsamina are usually utilized with Okra soup by the Kanuris of Borno State where the plant is locally known as the vegetable ( Jabeen and Khanum, 2017). M. balsamina is preferred as an ingredient in aphrodisiac preparations however in Senegal they prefer to use the fruits as purgative agents, poultice and vermifuge ( Leung et al., 2009; Souda et al., 2018).
